physical_appearance:\The image shows a digital print
 an artist\u0027s proof
 and a slide. They are rectangular in shape. The background of the digital print and artist\u0027s proof are purple in colour. They feature the backs of two workers
 which are facing the direction in which the photograph was captured. Their heads are covered with red headgear
 and they are carrying blue pails. Patches of grass can be seen on the ground. The image at the bottom shows a slide. It is black-and-white in colour. It is held in place by a frame. On the borders of the frame
 \\Two Workers\\ is stated at the bottom for the image at the bottom. \\Tan Lip Seng
